projectName: Lusaka Water Supply and Sanitation Improvement

economicViability.comments: Strong economic returns with IRR of 18.3% and significant social benefits

technicalFeasibility.comments: Proven technology with local implementation capacity available

financialSustainability.comments: Revenue recovery model viable through water tariffs

socialImpact.comments: Direct benefit to 1.2M urban residents, critical health impact

environmentalCompliance.comments: Environmental Impact Assessment completed, mitigation plans adequate

ndpAlignment.comments: Strongly aligned with Eighth NDP urban infrastructure priorities

nextSteps: Proceed to procurement stage

projectName: Skills Development and Technical Education Expansion

economicViability.comments: Long-term economic impact significant, IRR 21.5% reflects human capital value

technicalFeasibility.comments: Expansion of existing successful programs with proven models

financialSustainability.comments: Requires ongoing budget support, some cost recovery through industry partnerships

socialImpact.comments: Critical for youth employment and industrial development

environmentalCompliance.comments: Minimal environmental impact, green skills training included

ndpAlignment.comments: Directly addresses NDP human capital development pillar

nextSteps: Finalize financing agreement with AfDB

economicViability.comments: Strong social returns, economic benefits through improved productivity

technicalFeasibility.comments: Standard hospital construction and equipment, local capacity available

financialSustainability.comments: Operational costs require significant budget allocation, limited cost recovery

socialImpact.comments: Critical health services for 950,000 people in mining communities

environmentalCompliance.comments: Medical waste management plans comprehensive and compliant

ndpAlignment.comments: Aligned with health systems strengthening priorities

nextSteps: Complete loan negotiations with World Bank

economicViability.comments: Economic IRR 16.8% driven by trade facilitation and market access

technicalFeasibility.comments: Complex terrain challenges, requires experienced contractor

financialSustainability.comments: PPP structure reduces government financial burden

socialImpact.comments: Connects 780,000 rural residents to markets and services

environmentalCompliance.comments: EIA required for sensitive ecological areas along route

ndpAlignment.comments: Strong alignment with rural development and connectivity goals

conditions: Complete Environmental Impact Assessment for protected areas
nextSteps: Address conditional requirements within 90 days

projectName: Kafue Gorge Lower Hydro Expansion Phase II

economicViability.comments: Solid economic returns but Phase I lessons need incorporation

technicalFeasibility.comments: Proven technology, builds on Phase I infrastructure

financialSustainability.comments: Power purchase agreements provide revenue certainty

socialImpact.comments: Energy security benefits, some resettlement concerns

environmentalCompliance.comments: Environmental mitigation from Phase I needs strengthening

ndpAlignment.comments: Critical for national energy security objectives

conditions: Independent technical review of Phase I performance
nextSteps: Submit revised environmental and social safeguards plan

economicViability.comments: Strong potential with IRR 20.4%, market demand confirmed

technicalFeasibility.comments: Standard tourism infrastructure, private sector interest confirmed

financialSustainability.comments: PPP model reduces fiscal burden, revenue sharing negotiated

socialImpact.comments: Employment creation and local business opportunities significant

environmentalCompliance.comments: Heritage site considerations addressed, tourism sustainability plan in place

ndpAlignment.comments: Supports tourism diversification strategy

nextSteps: Finalize PPP concession and commence procurement

economicViability.comments: Economic returns positive but dependent on farmer adoption rates

technicalFeasibility.comments: Water resources adequate, scheme design requires refinement

financialSustainability.comments: Operation and maintenance cost recovery mechanism unclear

socialImpact.comments: Direct benefit to 125,000 smallholder farmers, food security impact

environmentalCompliance.comments: Water use permits required, downstream impact assessment needed

ndpAlignment.comments: Aligned with food security and agricultural diversification

conditions: Develop comprehensive O&M cost recovery strategy
Complete water resources assessment and permits
nextSteps: Resubmit with revised feasibility study addressing identified gaps
